languages.text: "Наверное, ко мне применимо то, что зовут богатым послужным списком: расследования, подавление бунтов, карательные рейды. На моем счету десятки операций". {n}Соломон перечисляет сухо, без намека на гордость.{/n}

"I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Наверное, ко мне применимо то, что зовут богатым послужным списком: расследования, подавление бунтов, карательные рейды. На моем счету десятки операций". {n}Соломон перечисляет сухо, без намека на гордость.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}

"I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}

languages.text: 「実績があり、多岐にわたる経歴があると言えるでしょう。捜査、反乱の鎮圧、懲罰的襲撃…完了した作戦は何十件にもなります」{n}ソロモーンは誇らしげな様子を一切見せず、淡々とそう締めくくった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「実績があり、多岐にわたる経歴があると言えるでしょう。捜査、反乱の鎮圧、懲罰的襲撃…完了した作戦は何十件にもなります」{n}ソロモーンは誇らしげな様子を一切見せず、淡々とそう締めくくった。{/n}

languages.text: "Man könnte wohl sagen, ich habe eine nachweislich vielfältige Leistungsbilanz: Untersuchungen, Niederschlagungen von Aufständen, Strafrazzien – Dutzende von abgeschlossenen Operationen", {n}zählt Solomorne ohne einen Hauch von Stolz auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Man könnte wohl sagen, ich habe eine nachweislich vielfältige Leistungsbilanz: Untersuchungen, Niederschlagungen von Aufständen, Strafrazzien – Dutzende von abgeschlossenen Operationen", {n}zählt Solomorne ohne einen Hauch von Stolz auf.{/n}

languages.text: « J'imagine que j'ai une expérience que l'on peut qualifier d'éclectique : enquêtes, suppressions de rebelles, descentes punitives... Au total, plus d'une douzaine d'opérations, » {n}conclut Solomorne d'un ton égal, ne laissant transparaître aucune fierté.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que j'ai une expérience que l'on peut qualifier d'éclectique : enquêtes, suppressions de rebelles, descentes punitives... Au total, plus d'une douzaine d'opérations, » {n}conclut Solomorne d'un ton égal, ne laissant transparaître aucune fierté.{/n}

languages.text: «Supongo que tengo lo que usted consideraría un expediente variado y de eficacia probada: investigaciones, rebeliones sofocadas, redadas punitivas, docenas de operaciones completadas en total», {n}concluye Solomorne sin el más mínimo atisbo de orgullo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que tengo lo que usted consideraría un expediente variado y de eficacia probada: investigaciones, rebeliones sofocadas, redadas punitivas, docenas de operaciones completadas en total», {n}concluye Solomorne sin el más mínimo atisbo de orgullo.{/n}

languages.text: “用你们的话说，我应该算得上是经验丰富、久经考验。我执行过调查、镇压叛军、惩戒突袭等诸多任务，完成过几十场行动。”{n}索罗蒙以干涩的声音总结着，语气中没有任何自豪的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “用你们的话说，我应该算得上是经验丰富、久经考验。我执行过调查、镇压叛军、惩戒突袭等诸多任务，完成过几十场行动。”{n}索罗蒙以干涩的声音总结着，语气中没有任何自豪的意味。{/n}

languages.text: "Envaiçeşit görevlerle dolu, rüşdünü kanıtlamış bir dosyam olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Bastırılan isyanlar, cezai baskınlar, onlarca tamamlanmış operasyon." {n}Solomorne, konuşmasını gurur emaresi göstermeden sonlandırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Envaiçeşit görevlerle dolu, rüştünü kanıtlamış bir dosyam olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Bastırılan isyanlar, cezai baskınlar, düzinelerce tamamlanmış operasyon." {n}Solomorne, konuşmasını gurur emaresi göstermeden sonlandırıyor.{/n}

languages.original_text: "I suppose I have what you would call a proven and diverse track record: investigations, rebel suppressions, punitive raids — dozens of completed operations," {n}Solomorne concludes dryly, without any hint of pride.{/n}
